column6: and air pollution poses little or no risk.
there may be a risk for some people
column7: particularly those who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

Description of Air Quality: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected.
Some members of the general public may experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
Health alert: The risk of health effects is increased for everyone.
Health warning of emergency conditions: everyone is more likely to be affected.
